name: Shock Current Squash
description:
Catho & Ano are electrodes who conduct electricity when near each other. 

To solve the 8 puzzle levels, use the electricity they produce to power doors, spinners and use capacitors and water to carry your charge.  

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 using Godot

Programming, Art and Level Music by diatidioti

Menu Music by CheesyNivs

*Windows Defender might recognise the game as a threat because it is an unidentified developer, but it is a false positive.
